commands.speaker: Girl
commands.line: It looks fun, so I'm happy to cheer you on, but I don't think I can commit to actually volunteering... But I'll show up as an audience member, and I wish you all the best.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Hey, wait...

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: *Sigh* Even though she finally agreed to meet in person and everything.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: She'll show up as an audience member, huh... That's what the person before said too. I guess it was a wasted trip coming all the way out here to Akihabara.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: No... We're all done for if I don't do my very best. Now's not the time to be complaining.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: All right, I'll call up the next person!

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Hmm? Oh! It really is you!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Honoka and Chika...?

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: What a coincidence, running into you here! Although you seem a little tired. What's wrong?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Oh, it's nothing...

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: It must be fate that we ran into each other. Do you want to go somewhere and talk?

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Yeah! I wanna eat something sweet!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Oh, but I have some phone calls to make...

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Aw, c'mon.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Don't worry about that!

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Are you having a hard time with something? Wait... Of course you are. Setsuna told me all about what's going on with the volunteers.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Oh...

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Are you sure we can't do anything to help? You seem really exhausted.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: No, no, I'm totally fine! I actually wanted to apologize to you for how that turned out, even though you helped us get ready for it.

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Oh, don't be like that. That wasn't your fault at all. And we want to help.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: You're already doing plenty. You put out the call for more volunteers on social media after the info session, right? We've got people who contacted us after seeing that.

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Well, that's good, but... You look so down, and I'm pretty worried.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: *Chuckle* I'm sorry you have to see me like this.

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: If you're having trouble, reach out anytime, okay? Maybe it's something you can't really talk to the Nijigasaki girls about?

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Wait, Honoka, are there really things you can't talk to the μ's members about?

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Sure there are. The truth is, I've gained a little weight and my costumes are a bit tight.

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Kotori brings the most delicious snacks, and I end up eating way too many of them. I really don't want Umi to find out!

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: That's true, you'll be in for a serious scolding.

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: That's if I get off easy!

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Anyway, we're not here to talk about that. Actually, we had something we wanted to discuss with you.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Sorry, we just told you that you could come to us with anything and here we are with a request.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Huh? What is it?

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: We told you about how school idols all over the country have contacted us to say they want to perform too, right?

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: So Honoka and I have been thinking about our performances and discussing who should be first in the main stage lineup.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Yes, and I thought that μ's should do it.

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Actually, Chika and I think that the Nijigasaki school idols should.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: What?

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: I mean, the School Idol Festival's slogan is Come Together, Dream Together! And you guys at Nijigasaki are the ones who've put forth the most effort to make it all happen.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Plus, we saw that song your club sang together before, and it'd be just perfect for the School Idol Festival!

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Which is why, as long as it's all right with you guys, we want to perform it with you!

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: So would you teach us the choreography?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Of course! But is that really okay?! I think everyone's going to be thrilled when they hear this! To be honest, it's our dream to perform alongside μ's and Aqours.

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: We feel the same way! We wanted to perform alongside Nijigasaki too. Right, Chika?

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Yup. This'll definitely get everyone really pumped!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Okay. As soon as I get home, I'll send both of you the info for the choreography.

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: We'll be waiting!

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: I hope it's not too hard.

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Ahaha, let's do our best!

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: See you later, then!

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: We'll message you later too!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Okay! See you!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (Finally, the Nijigasaki school idols will get to stand on the same stage as μ's and Aqours... A chance like this doesn't come around every day.)

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (I've definitely got to get enough volunteers to make the dreams of everyone at Nijigasaki come true, for μ's and Aqours and school idols nationwide.)

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: If I can get 1,000 people, everyone's dreams will come true. I've got to make it happen!
